Class EnemyShipFollower

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • EnemyShip
        • EnemyShipFollower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnyGroup, GroupB

    public class EnemyShipFollower
extends EnemyShip
    This class represents the Follower type of EnemyShip. A follower enemy has a constant speed and it calculates the direction to the player ship and rotates to follow it.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Mossad Helali.
